member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control how text is rendered and fonts are substituted.

member.name: E:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.ResolveFont
member.summary: This event is raised whenever a PDF font needs to be resolved to a device font.

member.name: E:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.ResolveCMap
member.summary: Fired when a CMap need to be resolved.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.FontSearchPath
member.summary: A semi-colon separated list of folders to search for font files that are included in the substitution map. or referenced in the ResolveFont event. The folders are searched from left to right until the font file is found.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.FontSubstitutionMap
member.summary: This map lets you define which external fonts are used to render fonts that are not embedded.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.CMapFolder
member.summary: This string points to the path where the CMaps can be found. CMaps are used when displaying some fonts, mostly Chinese, Japanese or Korean (also known as CJK fonts). The CMaps are part of the zip file you have downloaded from our website.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TextRenderSettings.RenderText
member.summary: Controls whether text will be rendered. If set to false, no text will be rendered. The default is true.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ActionRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control which actions are executed.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ActionRenderSettings.ExecutePageOpenAction
member.summary: Execute the Page Open action before rendering. Default is false.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorProfile
member.summary: ICC Based color profile, used to describe the color profile of the output device during rasterization.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorProfile.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: ColorProfile constructor. Reads the ICC Based color profile from stream. The stream can be disposed of after the ColorProfile instance has been created.
member.param: The stream providing the ICC Based color profile.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.GdiRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control GDI rendering.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.GdiRenderSettings.Synchronized
member.summary: Setting Synchronized to true will use a global lock for all GDI calls that get invoked by Page.Draw.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.GdiRenderSettings.WorkAroundClosePathBug
member.summary: If set, GDI (sub)paths will be closed by explicitly adding a line to the starting point of a (sub)path. If false, GDI subpaths will be closed via the GDI Path.CloseFigure() call. The default is false.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.LayerCollection

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary
member.summary: The box which should be used as outline for the page.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.Default
member.summary: The dimensions of the intersection of the media box and the crop box. If the crop box is not present, the visible box is set to the media box.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.MediaBox
member.summary: The boundaries of the physical medium on which the page is intended to be displayed or printed.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.CropBox
member.summary: The visible region. When the page is displayed or printed, its contents are to be clipped (cropped).

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.BleedBox
member.summary: The region to which the contents of the page should be clipped when output in a production environment.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.TrimBox
member.summary: The intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary.ArtBox
member.summary: The extent of the page’s meaningful content (including potential white space) as intended by the page’s creator.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.Message
member.summary: Message.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.Message.Text
member.summary: The message text.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.Message.Exception
member.summary: The exception that caused this error message.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.Message.Severity
member.summary: The severity of the message.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for converting PDF pages to TIFF images. By default, black-and-white images will be generated, using CCITT Group 3 fax compression.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new ConvertToTiffOptions with default settings.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.#ctor(System.Double,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.TiffCompression)
member.summary: Create a new ConvertToTiffOptions with given compression.
member.param: The resolution the image will be saved in (in DPI).
Compression algorithm to use.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.#ctor(System.Double,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.TiffCompression,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new ConvertToTiffOptions with given compression.
member.param: Compression algorithm to use.
Invert the image if requested.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.Compression
member.summary: Compression algorithm to use. Default is CcittG3.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.InvertImage
member.summary: Invert the TIFF image if set to true. Some TIFF viewers don't respect all tags and display the image inverted. This setting should fix that.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.Resolution
member.summary: Resolution in DPI. Default is 150.0.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.DitherMatrix
member.summary: This is the matrix which used in the dithering process.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToTiffOptions.PixelFormat
member.summary: The pixel format that will be used for the image.

member.summary: Severity of a message

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.MessageSeverity.Error
member.summary: An error.

member.summary: Base class of product specific custom attributes that let you enter the redistribution license key as an attribute of the entry or calling assembly.

member.summary: The type of license key.

The value to use (retrieved from the 'MyAccount' section from our website).

member.summary: The key entered in the constructor.

member.name: P:TallComponents.Licensing.PDFRasterizerLicenseAttribute.Value
member.summary: The value entered in the constructor.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageStripMode
member.summary: Images that are composed of tiles of smaller images can cause interpolation artifacts.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageStripMode.HighSpeed
member.summary: Accept interpolation artifacts while drawing images that are composed of tiles of smaller images, decreasing the time needed to draw them.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageStripMode.HighQuality
member.summary: Avoid interpolation artifacts while drawing images that are composed of tiles of smaller images, increasing the time needed to draw them.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontLocation
member.summary: Specifies whether a font has been resolved.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontLocation.Unresolved
member.summary: No definition for the font has been found.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontLocation.System
member.summary: The font is available as a system font. This is the case for example if no entry in the font substitution map matches the given font and a font with the same name has been found as a system font.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontLocation.File
member.summary: The font is available as a file. This is the case for example if a path to the font file has been added to the font substition map.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.FontLocation.Data
member.summary: The font is available as data. This is the case for example if the the font is embedded in the document or if the font data has been added as a stream to the font substitution map.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.CurveRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control how curves are rendered.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.CurveRenderSettings.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Specifies whether smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines and curves and the edges of filled areas. Default is AntiAlias.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.CurveRenderSettings.RenderCurves
member.summary: Controls whether curves will be rendered. If set to false, no curves will be rendered. The default is true.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToWpfOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for converting PDF pages to Wpf objects.

member.summary: Create a new ConvertToImageOptions with default settings.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToWpfOptions.ConvertToImages
member.summary: If set, each PDF page will be converted to an image.

member.summary: Job has been started.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ExtractedImageInfo
member.summary: Represents a single occurrence of an image on a PDF page. Encapsulates both the image and its location on the page.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ExtractedImageInfo.Transformation
member.summary: The transformation that should be performed in order to draw the image at the right location. This transformation assumes that the original coordinate system has its origin at the lower-left corner and a unit corresponds to a point (1/72 inch). It also assumes that the image is drawn at the origin of the transformed coordinate system as a unit rectangle.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ExtractedImageInfo.Bitmap
member.summary: The extracted image.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Document.ConvertToWpf(TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToWpfOptions)
member.summary: Creates a WPF FixedDocument instance for this PDF document.
member.param: The rendersetting that will be used. These basically influence the graphical aspects of the result, such as the quality of the graphics, font mapping and which types of elements are converted.
The conversion options. These control coversion that are not covered by the rendersettings.

member.summary: Creates a WPF FixedDocument instance for this PDF document.
member.param: The rendersetting that will be used. These basically influence the graphical aspects of the result, such as the quality of the graphics, font mapping and which types of elements are converted.
The conversion options. These control coversion that are not covered by the rendersettings.
The first page to convert (zero-based).
The last page to convert (zero-based).

The summary to which diagnostics are written. This may be null.

member.summary: All settings related to layer rendering.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings.RenderPageGraphics
member.summary: Controls whether the page graphics will be rendered. If set to false, no page graphics will be rendered. The default is true. This flag does not influence the rendering of annotations, so it can be used to render annotations only.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings.RenderPurpose
member.summary: Specifies in what way the rendering result will be used. The default is "View".

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings.CurveSettings
member.summary: All settings related to curve rendering.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings.GdiSettings
member.summary: Used for Gdi workarounds.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings.RequiredTrustLevel
member.summary: This setting tells the software what environment it runs in. When running is an untrusted IIS environment

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control how images are rendered.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageRenderSettings.ImageStripMode
member.summary: Accept or avoid interpolation artifacts while drawing images that are composed of tiles of smaller images.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageRenderSettings.ApplyColorKeyMask
member.summary: Apply the color key mask of an image if it contains one.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ImageRenderSettings.RenderImages
member.summary: Controls whether images are rendered. If set to false, no images will be rendered. The default is true.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorRenderSettings
member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control how colorprofiles are processed and what background color is used for the document.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorRenderSettings.BackColor
member.summary: The back color (default is Color.White)

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorRenderSettings.TransformationMode
member.summary: The color transformation mode to use. This is a trade off between speed and quality.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorRenderSettings.OutputColorProfile
member.summary: The color profile of the output device. Default the profile is set to a sRGB color profile.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.InvalidPdfException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the PDF document is invalid.

member.summary: For serializing purposes only.
member.param: The serialization info.
The streaming context.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderPurpose
member.summary: Specifies in what way the rendering result will be used. This values determines which annotations will be rendered.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderPurpose.View
member.summary: The render result will be used for on-screen viewing. This means that the Annotation.Invisible property determines whether an annotation will be rendered.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderPurpose.Print
member.summary: The render result will be used for printing. This means that the Annotation.Print property determines whether an annotation will be rendered.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.EmbedMode
member.summary: The different ways that a font can be stored inside a PDF.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.EmbedMode.Unknown
member.summary: The font embed mode could not be determined.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.EmbedMode.ReferenceOnly
member.summary: The font is not embedded. Only a reference is stored inside the PDF.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.EmbedMode.Subset
member.summary: A subset of the font is embdedded inside the PDF.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.EmbedMode.Full
member.summary: The font is fully embedded inside the PDF.

member.summary: Encapsulates all settings that control which layers are rendered.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.LayerRenderSettings.Layers

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Orientation.Rotate0
member.summary: No rotation.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Orientation.Rotate90
member.summary: 90 degrees rotation, counter-clockwise.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Orientation.Rotate180
member.summary: 180 degrees rotation.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Orientation.Rotate270
member.summary: 270 degrees rotation, counter-clockwise.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorTransformationMode
member.summary: Render quality for colors.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorTransformationMode.HighSpeed
member.summary: HighSpeed uses a faster algorithm but with less quality ( especially for DeviceCMYK ).

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.ColorTransformationMode.HighQuality
member.summary: ICC Based profiles are used to transform colors from the color space to the device. Very good quality, but a bit slower.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TrustLevel
member.summary: Adjust the software to the environment is runs in.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TrustLevel.Medium
member.summary: This allows the software to be run under IIS using Medium trust, but memory usage is higher when using large images.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TrustLevel.High
member.summary: This allows the software to be run under IIS using High trust, but memory usage is higher when using large images.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.TrustLevel.Full
member.summary: Memory usage is low when using large images, but it can only be run in Full trust under IIS.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PixelFormat

member.summary: 1 bit per pixel, black and white.

member.name: F:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PixelFormat.Rgba32Bpp
member.summary: 32 bits per pixel, RGB + alpha.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob
member.summary: Represents an asynchronous drawing job.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.#ctor(TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page)
member.summary: Create a new asynchronous drawing job for the given page.
member.param: The page that is to be drawn.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Start(System.Drawing.Bitmap,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.PageBoundary,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix)
member.summary: Start drawing the page to the given bitmap.
member.param: The bitmap in which the page will be drawn.
The render settings that will be used to draw the page.
The page boundary that will be used for drawing. If the page boundary is not specified, PageBoundary.Default will used.
The transformation that will be applied before the page is drawn.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Stop
member.summary: Stop drawing. The job may not stop immediately, but at a moment that permits it.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Wait
member.summary: Wait until the job has stopped, or is ready.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.GetBitmap
member.summary: Get a copy of the bitmap for as far as it has been drawn. This may return null, e.g. when the job has not yet been started, or after calling Dispose for the job.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Dispose
member.summary: Stops, and Disposes the draw job. The job may not stop immediately, but at a moment that permits it.

member.name: E:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Updated
member.summary: Raised regularly while the job is running and immediately after drawing has finished. This event is provided as a convenience so that the generated bitmap can be inspected regularly, without needing to implement this functionality oneself. As a rule of thumb, this event gets fired at a higher frequency for simple drawing jobs, so that results can be shown quickly, and at a lower frequency for complex jobs, so that the drawing job itself will not be slowed down too much by frequent updates.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.JobStatus
member.summary: The job status.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.DrawJob.Summary
member.summary: The summary of the current drawing job.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.ConvertToWpf(TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.RenderSettings,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.ConvertToWpfOptions,TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Diagnostics.Summary)
member.summary: Create a FixedPage instance for this page.
member.param: The rendersetting that will be used. These basically influence the graphical aspects of the result, such as the quality of the graphics, font mapping and which types of elements are converted.
The conversion options. These control coversion that are not covered by the rendersettings.
The summary to which diagnostics are written. This may be null

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.Width
member.summary: Width of this page in points.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.Height
member.summary: Height of this page in points.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.Orientation
member.summary: Orientation of this page in degrees. Default is Rotate0.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.MediaBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in points with the origin at the bottom left corner, defining the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page is intented to be displayed or printed.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.CropBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in points with the origin at the bottom left corner, defining the visible region of default user space. When the page is displayed or printed, its contents are to be clipped (cropped) to this rectangle and then imposed on the output medium in some implementation-defined manner.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.BleedBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in points with the origin at the bottom left corner, defining the region to which the contents of the page should be clipped when output in a production environment.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.TrimBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in points with the origin at the bottom left corner, defining the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.ArtBox
member.summary: A rectangle, expressed in points with the origin at the bottom left corner, defining the extent of the page meaningful content (including potential white space) as intended by the page's creator.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Page.SingleImageOnly
member.summary: True if and only if the content of this PDF page consists of a single image only.

member.summary: A font used inside the document.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.Font.EmbedMode
member.summary: How the font is stored inside the PDF.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.Font.Bold
member.summary: Whether this font is bold by design.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.Font.Italic
member.summary: Whether this font is italic by design.

member.name: P:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Fonts.Font.Name
member.summary: The name of the font.

member.name: T:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.FontStyleEmulation
member.summary: Font style emulation settings. Works in combination with FontSubstitutionMap.

member.name: M:TallComponents.PDF.Rasterizer.Configuration.FontStyleEmulation.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create settings for the font style emulation.
member.param: Emulate the bold font style by drawing a line on the outlines of the characters.
Emulate the italic font style by skewing the characters.

member.summary: A rectangle represents an area on the page.
